skills.label: Manage Azure subscriptions
items: May include but not limited to: assign administrator permissions
Configure cost center quotas and tagging

skills.label: Analyze resource utilization and consumption
items: May include but not limited to: configure diagnostic settings on resources

skills.label: Manage resource groups
items: May include but not limited to: allocate resource policies
Implement and set tagging on resource groups

skills.label: Create and configure storage accounts
items: May include but not limited to: configure network access to the storage account
Install and use azure storage explorer
Monitor activity log by using log analytics

skills.label: Import and export data to Azure
items: May include but not limited to: create export from azure job
Configure and use azure blob storage
Configure azure content delivery network (cdn) endpoints

skills.label: Configure Azure files
items: May include but not limited to: create azure file share

skills.label: Implement Azure backup
items: May include but not limited to: configure and review backup reports

skills.label: Create and configure a VM for Windows and Linux
items: May include but not limited to: configure high availability
Configure monitoring, networking, storage, and virtual machine size

skills.label: Automate deployment of VMs
items: May include but not limited to: modify azure resource manager (arm) template
Save a deployment as an arm template

skills.label: Manage Azure VM
items: May include but not limited to: add data discs
Automate configuration management by using powershell desired state configuration (dsc) and vm agent by using custom script extensions
Move vms from one resource group to another

skills.label: Manage VM backups
items: May include but not limited to: configure vm backup

skills.label: Create connectivity between virtual networks
items: May include but not limited to: create and configure vnet peering
Create and configure vnet to vnet

skills.label: Implement and manage virtual networking
items: May include but not limited to: configure private and public ip addresses, network routes, network interface, subnets, and virtual network

skills.label: Configure name resolution
items: May include but not limited to: configure azure dns

skills.label: Create and configure a Network Security Group (NSG)
items: May include but not limited to: create security rules
Associate nsg to a subnet or network interface

skills.label: Manage Azure Active Directory (AD)
items: May include but not limited to: add custom domains
Configure azure ad identity protection, azure ad join, and enterprise state roaming

skills.label: Manage Azure AD objects (users, groups, and devices)
items: May include but not limited to: create users and groups

skills.label: Implement and manage hybrid identities
items: May include but not limited to: install and configure azure ad connect
